price: (16) But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a ruinous seizure.
arabic: فَعَصَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ أَخۡذٗا وَبِيلٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: faʿaṣā fir'ʿawnu al-rasūla fa-akhadhnāhu akhdhan wabīlan
